name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 419 — Morning Temperature Check (15.9°C, 72% RH)
description:
At 06:56 on 2026-01-01, MaMeeFarm™ recorded the morning environmental condition before starting daily work.
A physical digital hygrometer/thermometer reading was captured as ground-truth evidence.

Temperature: 15.9°C

Humidity: 72% RH

Context: Pre-work daily verification (continuous proof routine)

This record is part of DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) where evidence is accumulated forward-only and remains independently verifiable.
